author: ETA PRIME
description:
AMD Radeon 9000 Series DELIVERS Amazing Linux Gaming Performance using Bazzite OS!
In this video we take look at the new RDNA4 based AMD Radeon RX 9070 gaming in Linux using Bazzite OS. small form factor gaming PC that has a 16 Core Laptop CPU and an AMD Radeon RX 9070! 1440P gaming with ease is possible
Like Steam Deck OS bazzite offers an easy to navigate gaming interface perfect for couch gaming.
#rx9070 #RDNA4 #AMD #Gaming #etaprime 

Full Build Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S8cQyn2-53o
Get Bazzite OS here: https://bazzite.gg/

Parts used in this build: BD795i SE AIO Motherboard: https://amzn.to/4iDYXli
32GB SODIMM DDR5 Ram: https://amzn.to/3FuXf7l
2TB M.2 SSD: https://amzn.to/3DQup0B
RX 9070: https://www.newegg.com/asus-prime-rx9070-o16g-amd-radeon-rx-9070-16gb-gddr6/p/N82E16814126748
SFF PC Case: https://amzn.to/4iMuH7x
650w sfx power supply: https://amzn.to/3R5whFN

title: AMD Radeon 9000 Series DELIVERS Amazing Linux Gaming Performance
